attributes.action: Pay 3rd year student nurses working on the frontline now
attributes.additional_details: These students are putting their life’s at risk for us and should be treated the same as everyone on the frontline
attributes.background: Pay the student nurses now they are on frontline and should be payed

rejection.details:
Student placements are a matter for the educational institutions the student is enrolled in, the organisation sponsoring the placement, and the regulatory bodies that are responsible for the qualifications, not the Government or Parliament.

If you have concerns about continuing with a placement you should raise these with the educational institution you are enrolled in, the organisation sponsoring your placement, and the relevant regulatory body.

You may wish to sign this petition calling on the Government to Reimburse Nursing students who are prematurely called out into the workforce:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302844
